page.title: 20A Last Look at Harpenden
page.content: Three schools from Harpenden, The Grove, Wood End and The Lea have been working together to produce this Domesday Project about Harpenden. We have looked at, learned and written about many of the interesting parts of our town. However, we feel many other things should have been mentioned for example: the consumer survey test centre for the 'Which' magazine; the research done into pesticides at the laboratory of the Ministry of Agriculture, Fisheries and Food; the old manor house at Rothamsted, the Public Hall which is the meeting place for so many groups and societies; The Common and the concern of so many folk to preserve the village atmosphere in a growing community. Harpenden is a green and pleasant place to live and we hope you have enjoyed finding out about it in our work.
